name: TeeVee Birds (Matticus Games) (Matticus Games)
description:
JUMP INTO A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A RAVEN PECKER!

Your goal is to make your way through the the tunnel of obstacles, Grab the Golden Pineapple, snatch the Pistachio Bugs, collect all the coins, and hit the bullseye at the end!

Goodluck

CONTROLS:

  • Right Trigger or Space = Fly Up
  • Left Trigger or Left Shift = Fly Down
  • Left Stick or "A" and "D" = Fly Right and Left
  • B Button or "W" = Dash
